name: Bush Hockey League
description: Aggressive hockey is back! Experience hockey the way it was meant to be played in this old school arcade style hockey game where blood on the ice is just another day at the rink. Big moustaches, no helmets, dirty hits, bench-clearing brawls, goalie fights, and stick fights – that’s Bush Hockey League.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6700 @ 2.66 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 450 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9300 @ 2.50 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 or AMD equivalent Storage: 4 GB available space
